    Function reference

    Intellectual Property Data

    Functions for generating Intellectual Property data

    create_plants()
    Create Plant Breeder Rights IP data.
    create_designs()
    Create Designs IP data.
    create_trademarks()
    Create Trademarks IP data.
    create_patents()
    Create Patents IP data.

    ABS Census Data

    Functions for generating ABS Census data

    create_qualification()
    Create Regional Qualification Data
    create_stem()
    Create Regional Stem Employment Data.
    create_owner_managers()
    Create Regional Owner Manager Data
    create_kibs()
    Create Regional Knowledge Intensive Business Services Data
    create_skill()
    Create Regional Skill Data

    Other Data

    Functions for generating other data

    create_infrastructure()
    Create Infrastructure Data

    Derived Data

    Functions for generating data derived from other data included in this package

    ica()
    Industrial Comparative Advantage
    igo()
    Industrial Growth Opportunities
    location_quotient()
    Location Quotient
    create_regional_innovation()
    Create Regional Innovation

    Included Data

    Data included in this package

    regional_innovation
    Innovation metrics of SA2 regions for 2011 and 2016.
    knowledge_capability_data
    Knowledge capability metrics of SA2 regions between 2011 and 2016.
    kibs_industry_class
    Knowledge intensive business services industries by ANZSIC class.
